thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Love this hotel!
thread.title_full: Love this hotel! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MommaRose2016
title: Love this hotel!
text: It is close to the Arc de Triumph. Some rooms even have views of the Arc. The staff are so helpful, they were really great. Rooms are a descent size, but the bathroom is a little small. Smaller rooms are to be expected in older buildings though. I recommend opening your window if it gets a little hot during the day.
